title.narrative: Supporting Russia's long term climate policy development and implementation

description.narrative: Russia has committed itself to reduce its greenhouse gas emissions by 30 percent by 2030 compared to 1990. However, although there is a national action plan, the country has no strategic and political vision for a thriving low-carbon economy. Therefore, the project provides ideas and suggestions for an economic policy aimed at low-carbon development (LCD ). To this end, the project advises policy-makers and business leaders and draws up recommendations for action on low-carbon economic growth. At the same time, it strengthens the understanding of LCD in Russia and on an international level through economic analyses of trends, developments, and challenges. The conclusions drawn from these analyses will be discussed in a comprehensive stakeholder dialogue with representatives from politics, business, and academia to reach a shared understanding of LCD. The project results and proven formats serve as a model for other countries in the region.
